members.signatureAfterChange: LRESULT wmChar (int hwnd, int wParam, int lParam)
diff: -	* Feature in Windows.  For some reason, when the
-	* widget is a single line text widget, when the
-	* user presses tab, return or escape, Windows beeps.
-	* The fix is to look for these keys and not call
-	* NOTE: This only happens when the drop down list
+LRESULT wmChar (int hwnd, int wParam, int lParam) {
+	* Feature in Windows.  For some reason, when the
+	* widget is a single line text widget, when the
+	* user presses tab, return or escape, Windows beeps.
+	* The fix is to look for these keys and not call
+	* NOTE: This only happens when the drop down list

members.signatureBeforeChange: LRESULT wmChar (long hwnd, long wParam, long lParam)
members.signatureAfterChange: LRESULT wmChar (long hwnd, long wParam, long lParam)
diff: -	* Feature in Windows.  For some reason, when the
-	* widget is a single line text widget, when the
-	* user presses tab, return or escape, Windows beeps.
-	* The fix is to look for these keys and not call
-	* NOTE: This only happens when the drop down list
+		* Feature in Windows.  For some reason, when the
+		* widget is a single line text widget, when the
+		* user presses tab, return or escape, Windows beeps.
+		* The fix is to look for these keys and not call
+		* NOTE: This only happens when the drop down list
+		* Bug in Windows.  When the user types CTRL and BS
+		* in a combo control, a DEL character (0x08) is generated.
+		* Rather than deleting the text, the DEL character
+		* is inserted into the control. The fix is to detect
+		* this case and not call the window proc.
